title: Episode 1.4 | The Official History of the UK Strategic Nuclear Deterrent
itunes:author: Matthew Jones
description: Contributor(s): Matthew Jones | Matthew Jones draws on his official history of the UK strategic nuclear deterrent to discuss the strategic, political and diplomatic considerations that compelled UK governments, in the face of ever-increasing pressures on the defence budget, to persist in their efforts to develop nuclear weapons and to deploy a credible nuclear force.  For further information about the Department of International History please visit www.lse.ac.uk/International-History
